Title: Approximate MVDR and MMSE beamformers exploiting scale-invariant reconstruction of signals on microphones
insights: The paper does not directly compare MVDR and MMSE beamformers. The paper focuses on proposing approximate variants of MVDR and MMSE beamformers that do not require auxiliary methods for estimating source/noise covariance.

Title: Performance Comparison of DS/SS Code Acquisition using MMSE and MVDR Beamforming in Jamming
insights: The paper compares the performance of MMSE and MVDR beamformers for code acquisition in a DS/SS system.
